XMLDB.COMMENT: Script to add tables needed to work in Moodle Database.

TABLE.NAME: forum_post_like
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps registry of all the likes to posts made on a forum. Comes from local/activitites_plugin plugin.

FIELD.NAME: forumpostid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the liked post.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user liking the post.
